00022 /**
00023  * @file   ProbesetSummarizeEngine.cpp
00024  * @author Chuck Sugnet
00025  * @date   Mon Oct 24 12:21:35 2005
00026  * 
00027  * @brief  Program for summarizing probeset results from the command line. Requires
00028  * three main inputs: 1) layout file decribing individual probes and their grouping into 
00029  * probe sets. 2) clf file telling where probes are located on chip. 3) Data input files,
00030  * usually cel files.
00031  *
00032  * @todo runImp is getting long, time to refactor.
00033  * @todo Windows documentation and example quantification method.
00034  * @todo Figure out what debugging information necessary for remote troubleshooting and include it somewhere.
00035  * @todo Enable quantile normalization withing groups and median normalization across groups.
00036  * @todo DABG flag for -logP output
00037  * @todo Only read in required columns from map files.
00038  * @todo For QC Reports: consider making the P-value threshold for detection configurable
00039  *       from the command line, with the default set from the pgf file.
00040  */
00041

00081 ProbesetSummarizeEngine * ProbesetSummarizeEngine::FromBase(BaseEngine *engine)
00082 {
00083     if (engine != NULL && engine->getEngineName() == ProbesetSummarizeEngine::EngineName())
00084         return (ProbesetSummarizeEngine *)engine;
00085     return NULL;
00086 }

00088 ProbesetSummarizeEngine::ProbesetSummarizeEngine() {
00089     m_a5_global_input_file = NULL;
00090     m_a5_global_input_group = NULL;
00091     m_a5_global_output_file = NULL;
00092     m_a5_global_output_group = NULL;
00093     defineStdMethods();
00094     defineOptions();
00095 }

00100 void ProbesetSummarizeEngine::defineStdMethods() {
00101     m_stdMethods["plier-gcbg"] = "quant-norm.sketch=0.bioc=false,pm-gcbg,plier";
00102     m_stdMethods["plier-mm"] = "quant-norm.sketch=0.bioc=false,pm-mm,plier";
00103     m_stdMethods["rma"] = "rma-bg,quant-norm.sketch=0.usepm=true.bioc=true,pm-only,med-polish";
00104         m_stdMethods["rma-gc-scale"] = "gc-correction,scale-intensities,rma-bg,quant-norm.sketch=0.usepm=true.bioc=true,pm-only,med-polish";
00105     m_stdMethods["plier-gcbg-sketch"] = "quant-norm.sketch=-1.bioc=false,pm-gcbg,plier";
00106     m_stdMethods["plier-mm-sketch"] = "quant-norm.sketch=-1.bioc=false,pm-mm,plier";
00107     m_stdMethods["rma-sketch"] = "rma-bg,quant-norm.sketch=-1.usepm=true.bioc=true,pm-only,med-polish";
00108     m_stdMethods["rma-sketch-gc-scale"] = "gc-correction,scale-intensities,rma-bg,quant-norm.sketch=-1.usepm=true.bioc=true,pm-only,med-polish";
00109     m_stdMethods["gc-sst-rma-sketch"] = "gc-correction,scale-intensities,rma-bg,quant-norm.sketch=-1.usepm=true.bioc=true,pm-only,med-polish";
00110     m_stdMethods["gc-sstgl-rma-sketch"] = "gc-correction,scale-intensities.gain_lock_pct=0.75,rma-bg,quant-norm.sketch=-1.usepm=true.bioc=true,pm-only,med-polish";
00111     m_stdMethods["dabg"] = "pm-only,dabg";
00112         m_stdMethods["gc-dabg-median"] = "gc-correction,pm-only,dabg.usepercentile=true.percentile=0.50";
00113 }

00362 void ProbesetSummarizeEngine::defineStates() {
00363     defineOption("", "num-rows", PgOpt::INT_OPT,
00364                  "The number of rows on the chip.",
00365                  "-1");

00367                  "The number of cols on the chip.",
00368                  "-1");

00370                  "The number of probes on the chip.",
00371                  "-1");

00380 /** 
00381  * Make sure that our options are sane.
00382  * 
00383  * @param o - Options to be checked.
00384  */
00385 void ProbesetSummarizeEngine::checkOptionsImp() {
00386 
00387     defineStates();
00388 
00389     setLibFileOpt("cdf-file");
00390     setLibFileOpt("spf-file");
00391     setLibFileOpt("pgf-file");
00392     setLibFileOpt("clf-file");
00393     setLibFileOpt("bgp-file");
00394     setLibFileOpt("probeset-ids");
00395     setLibFileOpt("meta-probesets");
00396     setLibFileOpt("probe-class-file");
00397     setLibFileOpt("qc-probesets");
00398     setLibFileOpt("use-feat-eff");
00399     setLibFileOpt("target-sketch");
00400     setLibFileOpt("reference-profile");
00401     setLibFileOpt("kill-list");
00402     setLibFileOpt("a5-global-input-file");
00403     setLibFileOpt("a5-sketch-input-file");
00404     setLibFileOpt("a5-feature-effects-input-file");
00405 
00406     if (getOpt("explain") != "") { explain(); exit(0); }
00407 
00408     if (getOpt("out-dir") == "") {Err::errAbort("Must specify an output directory.");}
00409     if (getOpt("temp-dir") == "") { setOpt("temp-dir", Fs::join(getOpt("out-dir"),"temp")); }
00410 
00411     bool cdfMode = false;
00412     bool pgfMode = false;
00413 
00414     if (getOpt("cdf-file")!="" || getOpt("spf-file")!="") 
00415         cdfMode = true;
00416     if (getOpt("pgf-file")!="")
00417         pgfMode = true;
00418 
00419     if (cdfMode && pgfMode) {
00420         Err::errAbort("Must specify only one layout spec: cdf, pgf/clf, or spf file.");
00421     }
00422 
00423     string cdfFile = getOpt("cdf-file");
00424     string spfFile = getOpt("spf-file");
00425     string pgfFile = getOpt("pgf-file");
00426     string clfFile = getOpt("clf-file");
00427     string bgpFile = getOpt("bgp-file");
00428     string killListFile = getOpt("kill-list");
00429     vector<string> analysis = getOptVector("analysis");
00430 
00431     // Check that a global file was given if the user wants global a5 output
00432     if (getOpt("a5-global-file") == "") {
00433         vector<string> optionNames;
00434         getOptionNames(optionNames);
00435         for (size_t i=0; i<optionNames.size(); i++) {
00436             string name = optionNames[i];
00437             if ( name.find("use-global") != name.npos ) {
00438                 if ( getOptBool(name) ) {
00439                     Err::errAbort("--" + name + " option given, but no global file. Must specify --a5-global-file.");
00440                 }
00441             }
00442         }
00443     }
00444     // Check that a global input file was given if the user wants global a5 input
00445     if (getOpt("a5-global-input-file") == "") {
00446         vector<string> optionNames;
00447         getOptionNames(optionNames);
00448         for (size_t i=0; i<optionNames.size(); i++) {
00449             string name = optionNames[i];
00450             if ( name.find("input-global") != name.npos ) {
00451                 if ( getOptBool(name) ){
00452                     Err::errAbort("--" + name + " option given, but no global input file. Must specify --a5-global-input-file.");
00453                 }
00454             }
00455         }
00456     }
00457 
00458     // make sure global input and output files are different
00459     if (getOpt("a5-global-input-file") == getOpt("a5-global-file"))
00460         if (getOpt("a5-global-input-file") != "")
00461             Err::errAbort("Unable to use the same A5 file for global input and output.");
00462 
00463     /* Read in cel file list from other file if specified. */
00464     vector<string> celFiles;
00465     EngineUtil::getCelFiles(celFiles, this);
00466     if (celFiles.size() == 0)
00467         Err::errAbort("No cel files specified.");
00468     setOpt("cels",celFiles);
00469 
00470         for (int ianalysis=0; ianalysis<analysis.size (); ianalysis++)
00471                 EngineUtil::checkCelAnalysisType (analysis[ianalysis],celFiles);
00472 
00473     vector<string> resultFiles = getOptVector("result-files");
00474     if (resultFiles.size() > 0) {
00475         if (celFiles.size() != resultFiles.size())
00476             Err::errAbort("result-files option used but is not the same size as cel file listing");
00477         bool ccOut = getOptBool("cc-chp-output");
00478         bool mdOut = getOptBool("md-chp-output");
00479         bool xdaOut = getOptBool("xda-chp-output");
00480         if ((ccOut && mdOut) || (ccOut && xdaOut) || (mdOut && xdaOut)) 
00481             Err::errAbort("cannot use multiple CHP output formats with the result-files option");
00482     }
00483 
00484     if ((cdfMode) && (cdfFile=="" && spfFile=="")) {
00485         Err::errAbort("Must specify a layout file like cdf, spf, or pgf/clf files.");
00486     }
00487     if ((!cdfMode || pgfMode) && getOptBool("xda-chp-output")) {
00488         Err::errAbort("Must use a CDF file to generate an XDA CHP file.");
00489     }
00490     if (getOpt("probeset-ids") != "" && getOptBool("xda-chp-output")) {
00491         Err::errAbort("Can't specify a subset and XDA CHP output at same time. Must analyze all probesets for XDA CHP file output.");
00492     }
00493     if (killListFile != "" && !pgfMode && cdfFile == "") {
00494         Err::errAbort("Can't use a kill list with spf file");
00495     }
00496     if (killListFile != "" && getOptBool("xda-chp-output")) {
00497         Err::errAbort("Can't specify a kill list and XDA CHP output at same time.");
00498     }
00499     if (killListFile != "" && getOptBool("cc-md-chp-output")) {
00500         Err::errAbort("Can't specify a kill list and Expression CC CHP output at same time.");
00501     }
00502     if (killListFile != "" && getOptBool("cc-chp-output")) {
00503         Err::errAbort("Can't specify a kill list and Multi Data CC CHP output at same time.");
00504     }
00505     if (bgpFile!="" && !pgfMode)
00506         Err::errAbort("Can only use BGP file with PGF/CLF file. Not CDF or SPF.");
00507 
00508     /* Some sanity checks. */
00509     if (analysis.empty())
00510         Err::errAbort("Must specify at least one analysis to preform.");
00511 
00512     if (getOpt("probeset-ids") != "" && getOpt("meta-probesets") != "")
00513         Err::errAbort("Can't specify both probeset-ids and meta-probesets options.");
00514 
00515     // Check chip types
00516     vector<string> chipTypesInLayout;
00517 
00518     /* Get the intial info about the chip and check cel files to make sure
00519        they match. */
00520     colrow_t numRows = 0, numCols = 0;
00521     int probeCount = 0;
00522     int probeSetCount=0;
00523     int channelCount = 1;
00524 
00525     if (cdfFile!="")
00526         EngineUtil::getCdfChipType(chipTypesInLayout, numRows, numCols, probeCount, probeSetCount, cdfFile);
00527     else if (spfFile!="")
00528         EngineUtil::getSpfChipType(chipTypesInLayout, numRows, numCols, probeCount, probeSetCount, spfFile);
00529     else if (pgfMode) 
00530         EngineUtil::getPgfChipType(chipTypesInLayout, numRows, numCols, probeCount, pgfFile, clfFile);
00531     else
00532         Err::errAbort("Must specify a cdf file, spf file, or PGF and CLF files.");
00533 
00534     setOpt("num-rows", ToStr(numRows));
00535     setOpt("num-cols", ToStr(numCols));
00536     setOpt("probe-count", ToStr(probeCount));
00537     setOpt("probeset-count", ToStr(probeSetCount));
00538     setOpt("channel-count", ToStr(channelCount));
00539 
00540     if (chipTypesInLayout.empty() || chipTypesInLayout[0] == "" || probeCount == 0) 
00541         Err::errAbort("Problem determining ChipType in file: " + 
00542                       ( cdfFile != "" ? cdfFile : 
00543                         ( spfFile != "" ? spfFile : pgfFile + ToStr(", ") + clfFile) 
00544                           ) );
00545 
00546     /* Did the user "force" a set of chip types via options? */
00547     vector<string> chipTypesSupplied = getOptVector("chip-type");
00548 
00549 
00550     /* Figure out what chip type to report */
00551     if (chipTypesSupplied.size() > 0) {
00552         setOpt("chip-type", chipTypesSupplied[0]);
00553     } 
00554     else if (chipTypesInLayout.size() > 0) {
00555         setOpt("chip-type", chipTypesInLayout[0]);
00556     } 
00557     else {
00558         Err::errAbort("Unable to figure out a chip type.");
00559     }
00560 
00561     /* Do Chip Type Check */
00562     if (!getOptBool("force")) {
00563         if (chipTypesSupplied.size() > 0) {
00564             EngineUtil::checkCelChipTypes(chipTypesSupplied, probeCount, celFiles, numRows, numCols);
00565             EngineUtil::checkChipTypeVectors(chipTypesSupplied, chipTypesInLayout);
00566         }
00567         else {
00568             EngineUtil::checkCelChipTypes(chipTypesInLayout, probeCount, celFiles, numRows, numCols);
00569         }
00570     }
00571 }
00572 
00573 
00574 /** 
00575  * @brief High level function to set up analysis streams and then
00576  * start the gears turning.
00577  * 
00578  * @param asFactory - Object for making analysis streams.
00579  * @param errMsg - If there was a problem, error message gets filled in here.
00580  * @return true if successful, false otherwise.
00581  */
00582 void ProbesetSummarizeEngine::runImp() {
00583 
00584     // probeset names act as a common pool for a number of different
00585     // things so we don't have to copy the relatively large (in RAM)
00586     // probe names over and over. They are known to be used for the chp
00587     // file writers and meta probesets, but may also be used for other
00588     // things as time goes on. Change or delete them prematurely at your
00589     // own risk.
00590     std::vector<const char *> probesetNames;
00591     std::vector<const char *> probesetDisplayNames;
00592     vector<bool> probeSubset;
00593     ChipLayout *layout = NULL;
00594     vector<MetaProbeset *> metaSets;
00595     vector<AnalysisStreamExpression *> analysisStreams;
00596     vector<int> probesetIds;
00597     ProbeListFactory plFactory;
00598     //vector<ProbeListPacked> probeListVec;
00599     vector<bool> psToLoad;
00600     /* Define the currently hard-coded p-value threshold for detection, used
00601        by QC reporters.  Comment in sample-probe-summarize.pl: this should be
00602        configurable from the commandline and the default set from pgf file. */
00603     unsigned int numProbes = 0;
00604     IntensityMart *iMart = NULL;
00605     CelReader reader;
00606 
00607     try { // outer try for handling the exception.
00608         try { // inner try for memory clean up.
00609             if (!Fs::isWriteableDir(getOpt("out-dir")))
00610                 if (Fs::mkdirPath(getOpt("out-dir"), false) != APT_OK)
00611                     Err::errAbort("Can't make or write to directory: " + getOpt("out-dir"));
00612             makeTempDir(getOpt("temp-dir"));
00613   
00614             // Do we have a global output file?
00615             if (getOpt("a5-global-file") != "") {
00616                 m_a5_global_output_file=affx::TsvReport::openA5File(getOpt("a5-global-file"), !getOptBool("a5-global-file-no-replace"));
00617                 // default the group name
00618                 string groupName;
00619                 if (getOpt("a5-group")!="") {
00620                     groupName=getOpt("a5-group");
00621                 } 
00622                 else if (getOpt("set-analysis-name") != "") {
00623                     groupName=getOpt("set-analysis-name");
00624                 } 
00625                 else {
00626                     ///@todo we cannot call get name on analysis stream yet -- perhaps we need a static method to get the name given an analysis spec?
00627                     groupName="/";
00628                 }
00629                 m_a5_global_output_group=
00630                     m_a5_global_output_file->openGroup(groupName,affx::FILE5_CREATE|affx::FILE5_OPEN);
00631     
00632             }
00633 
00634             // ...a global input file?
00635             if (getOpt("a5-global-input-file") != "") {
00636                 // is the input and output files the same?
00637                 if (getOpt("a5-global-input-file") == getOpt("a5-global-file")) {
00638                     ///@todo allow same file for global input and output
00639                     Err::errAbort("Unable to use the same A5 file for global input and output.");
00640                 } 
00641                 else {
00642                     m_a5_global_input_file=new affx::File5_File();
00643                     m_a5_global_input_file->open(getOpt("a5-global-input-file"),affx::FILE5_OPEN_RO);
00644                 }
00645                 // default the group name
00646                 string groupName;
00647                 if (getOpt("a5-input-group") != "") {
00648                     groupName = getOpt("a5-input-group");
00649                 } 
00650                 else if (getOpt("set-analysis-name") != "") {
00651                     groupName=getOpt("set-analysis-name");
00652                 } 
00653                 else {
00654                     ///@todo we cannot call get name on analysis stream yet -- perhaps we need a static method to get the name given an analysis spec?
00655                     groupName="/";
00656                 }
00657                 m_a5_global_input_group=
00658                     m_a5_global_input_file->openGroup(groupName,affx::FILE5_OPEN_RO);
00659             }
00660 
00661             layout = new ChipLayout();
00662             ///@todo we only need this if pm-sum is used
00663             layout->setNeedPmAlleleMatch(true);
00664 
00665             // Load up some option values into local variables to make coding easier
00666             vector<string> celFiles = getOptVector("cels");
00667             vector<string> analysisStrings = getOptVector("analysis");
00668             unsigned int numRows = Convert::toUnsignedInt(getOpt("num-rows"));
00669             unsigned int numCols = Convert::toUnsignedInt(getOpt("num-cols"));
00670 
00671             // Load up probes to ignore
00672             probeidmap_t killList; // map of probe IDs to exclude
00673             string killListFile = getOpt("kill-list");
00674             if (killListFile != "") {
00675                 ChipLayout::fillInKillList(killListFile, killList, numRows, numCols);
00676             }
00677 
00678             // If we have a subset or meta probeset list then read it.
00679             bool haveMetaProbeset = (getOpt("probeset-ids") != "" || getOpt("meta-probesets") != "");
00680             if (haveMetaProbeset) {
00681                 bool metaFile = false;
00682                 string fileName;
00683                 if (getOpt("probeset-ids") != "" && getOpt("meta-probesets") != "")
00684                     Err::errAbort("Can't specify both probeset-ids and meta-probesets options.");
00685                 if (getOpt("meta-probesets") != "") {
00686                     fileName = getOpt("meta-probesets");
00687                     metaFile = true;
00688                 }
00689                 else {
00690                     fileName = getOpt("probeset-ids");
00691                     metaFile = false;
00692                 }
00693                 MetaProbeset::readMetaProbesets(fileName, metaFile, metaSets);
00694             }
00695 
00696             // To satisfy the function signature we create an empty set of Probes.
00697             std::vector<Probe *> emptySetOfProbes;      
00698 
00699             // will fill in metaSets if empty
00700             loadChipLayout( *layout, 
00701                             metaSets, 
00702                             //layout->m_PlFactory.m_probelist_vec,
00703                             killList, 
00704                             &probesetNames,
00705                             (getOptBool("use-pgf-names") == true ? &probesetDisplayNames : NULL),
00706                             emptySetOfProbes, 
00707                             probeSubset, 
00708                             false, 
00709                             false);
00710 
00711             AnalysisStreamFactory asFactory(QuantMethodFactory::Expression);
00712             AnalysisStreamFactory::setupAnalysisStreamFactory(
00713                 asFactory,
00714                 m_a5_global_input_file,
00715                 m_a5_global_input_group,
00716                 m_a5_global_output_file,
00717                 m_a5_global_output_group,
00718                 getOptVector("cels").size(),
00719                 getOptInt("probe-count"),
00720                 getOpt("out-dir"),
00721 
00722                 getOptBool("write-sketch"),
00723                 getOpt("target-sketch"),
00724 
00725                 getOptBool("write-profile"),
00726                 getOpt("reference-profile"),
00727 
00728                 getOptBool("a5-sketch"),
00729                 getOptBool("a5-sketch-use-global"),
00730 
00731                 getOptBool("a5-sketch-input-global"),
00732                 getOpt("a5-sketch-input-file"),
00733                 getOpt("a5-sketch-input-name"),
00734                 getOpt("a5-sketch-input-group"),
00735 
00736                 getOpt("use-feat-eff"),
00737                 getOptBool("a5-feature-effects-input-global"),
00738                 getOpt("a5-feature-effects-input-file"),
00739                 getOpt("a5-feature-effects-input-name"),
00740                 getOpt("a5-feature-effects-input-group"),
00741 
00742                 getOpt("a5-input-group"),
00743                 getOpt("a5-group"),
00744 
00745                 getOpt("set-analysis-name"),
00746                 ///@todo bit of a hack -- assumes a simple string search for med-polish or plier
00747                 getOptVector("analysis")[0],
00748 
00749                 getOpt("bgp-file"),
00750                 getOpt("annotation-file"),
00751                 *layout
00752                 );
00753 
00754 
00755             int toRun = metaSets.size();
00756 
00757             mergeProbeSubset(layout->m_PlFactory.m_probelist_vec, probeSubset);
00758 
00759             vector<int> desiredOrder;
00760             determineDesiredOrder(*layout, desiredOrder, asFactory, haveMetaProbeset, metaSets);
00761 
00762             numProbes = layout->getProbeCount();  
00763 
00764             string diskDir = getOpt("temp-dir");
00765             if (getOptBool("use-disk")) {
00766                 DiskIntensityMart* diskMart = 
00767                     new DiskIntensityMart(desiredOrder, 
00768                                           celFiles, 
00769                                           getOptInt("disk-cache") * 1048576,
00770                                           diskDir, 
00771                                           "apt-summarize.tmp",
00772                                           true);
00773                 if (haveMetaProbeset || getOptBool("store-duplicate-probes")) {
00774                     diskMart->setUseAuxMemCache(true);
00775                 }
00776                 iMart = diskMart;
00777             }
00778             else {
00779                 SparseMart* sparseMart = new SparseMart(desiredOrder, celFiles, true);
00780                 iMart = sparseMart;
00781             }
00782         
00783             assert(celFiles.size() > 0);
00784 
00785             // set up cel stat listener
00786             map<string, vector<bool> > masks;
00787 
00788             vector<bool> pmMask = layout->getPmProbeMask();
00789             masks["pm"] = pmMask;
00790 
00791             vector<bool> mmMask = layout->getMmProbeMask();
00792             int mmCount = 0;
00793             for (size_t i=0; i<mmMask.size(); i++)
00794                 if (mmMask[i])
00795                     mmCount++;
00796             if (mmCount > 5000) {
00797                 masks["mm"] = mmMask;
00798             }
00799 
00800             // if there are gc control probes, save a background mask and
00801             // also add probes to probeSubset.
00802             const vector<Probe*> &probesToLoad = asFactory.getGcControlProbes(); 
00803             if (probesToLoad.size() > 0) {
00804                 vector<bool> bgMask(pmMask.size(), false);
00805                 //
00806                 int probeSubset_size=probeSubset.size();
00807                 int bgMask_size=bgMask.size();
00808                 for (unsigned int i = 0; i < probesToLoad.size(); i++) {
00809                     int p_id = probesToLoad[i]->id;
00810                     if ((p_id>=probeSubset_size)||(p_id>=bgMask_size)) {
00811                         Err::errAbort("The probeid "+ToStr(p_id)+" from the BgpFile is out of range."
00812                                       " (0-"+ToStr(probeSubset_size)+")");
00813                     }
00814                     probeSubset.at(p_id) = true;
00815                     bgMask.at(p_id) = true;
00816                 }
00817                 masks["bgrd"] = bgMask;
00818             }
00819 
00820             Verbose::out(2, "Loading: " + ToStr(probeSubset.size()) + " probes");
00821             int subsetSum = 0;
00822             for (size_t blah = 0; blah < probeSubset.size(); blah++) {
00823                 if (probeSubset[blah]) {
00824                     subsetSum++;
00825                 }
00826             }
00827 
00828             if (getOpt("probe-class-file") != "")
00829                 EngineUtil::readProbeClassFile(getOpt("probe-class-file"), layout->getProbeCount(), masks);
00830 
00831             map<string, vector<bool> >::iterator maskIter;
00832             for (maskIter = masks.begin(); maskIter != masks.end(); maskIter++) {
00833                 int count = 0;
00834                 for (vector<bool>::iterator mIx = maskIter->second.begin(); mIx != maskIter->second.end(); mIx++)
00835                     if (*mIx) 
00836                         count++;
00837                 Verbose::out(2,"Number of " + maskIter->first + " probes is: " + ToStr(count));
00838             }
00839 
00840             CelStatListener celStats(masks);
00841 
00842             /* Make the analysis pathways. */
00843             for (size_t i = 0; i < analysisStrings.size(); i++) {
00844                 AnalysisStreamExpression *as = NULL;
00845 
00846                 if (analysisStrings[i] == "")
00847                     Err::errAbort("Invalid (blank) analysis specification");
00848                 as = asFactory.constructExpressionAnalysisStream(analysisStrings[i], *layout, m_stdMethods, getOpt("set-analysis-name"));
00849                 as->setOutPrefix(getOpt("out-dir"));
00850                 QuantExprMethod *eMethod = NULL;
00851                 eMethod = dynamic_cast<QuantExprMethod *>(as->getQuantMethod());
00852       
00853                 AnalysisInfo analInfo = makeAnalysisInfo(as, *layout, metaSets);
00854                 as->setInfo(analInfo);
00855 
00856                 setupReporters(as, eMethod, metaSets, &celStats);
00857                 analysisStreams.push_back(as);
00858 
00859                 // %HACK% This is the least painful way I could think of to pass
00860                 // the bgp filename to the QuantDabg QuantExprMethod.
00861                 if (InstanceOf(eMethod, QuantDabg)) {
00862                     QuantDabg* dabgMethod = dynamic_cast<QuantDabg*>(eMethod);
00863                     dabgMethod->setBgpFileName(getOpt("bgp-file"));
00864                                         dabgMethod->setGCCNpreprocessed(getOpt("analysis"));
00865                 }
00866             }
00867 
00868 
00869             /* Set up the cel reader */
00870             reader.setFiles(celFiles);
00871             for (unsigned int analysisIx = 0; analysisIx < analysisStreams.size(); analysisIx++)
00872                 analysisStreams[analysisIx]->registerChipStreamObjs(reader);
00873             reader.registerCelListener(&celStats);
00874             reader.registerIntensityMart(iMart);
00875 
00876             /* Read CEL files */
00877             reader.readFiles();
00878 
00879             writeHeaders(*iMart, analysisStreams);
00880             /* Write headers after iMart is populated as reports key off cels loaded into iMart */
00881             for (unsigned int analysisIx = 0; analysisIx < analysisStreams.size(); analysisIx++)
00882                 analysisStreams[analysisIx]->prepare(*iMart);
00883 
00884 
00885             /* Do the analysis */
00886             doSummaries(*layout, *iMart, layout->m_PlFactory.m_probelist_vec, metaSets, analysisStreams, toRun);
00887 
00888             /* Let the streams do their post summaries cleanup. */
00889             Verbose::out(1,"Flushing output reporters. Finalizing output.");
00890             for (unsigned int analysisIx = 0; analysisIx < analysisStreams.size(); analysisIx++)
00891                 analysisStreams[analysisIx]->finish();
00892             closeGlobalA5();
00893 
00894             Verbose::out(1,"Done.");
00895         } // inner try end
00896         catch(...) {
00897             for (uint32_t setIx = 0; setIx < metaSets.size(); setIx++) {
00898                 delete metaSets[setIx];
00899             }
00900             metaSets.clear();
00901             for (uint32_t psIx = 0; psIx < probesetNames.size(); psIx++) {
00902                 FreezArray(probesetNames[psIx]);
00903             }
00904             for (uint32_t psIx = 0; psIx < probesetDisplayNames.size(); psIx++) {
00905                 FreezArray(probesetDisplayNames[psIx]);
00906             }
00907             for (uint32_t i = 0; i < analysisStreams.size(); i++) 
00908                 delete analysisStreams[i];
00909             analysisStreams.clear();
00910             Freez(layout);
00911             Freez(iMart);
00912             closeGlobalA5();
00913             removeTempDir(getOpt("temp-dir"));
00914 
00915             // re-throw the unchanged exception.
00916             throw;
00917         }
00918     } // end outer try
00919     /* When things go wrong see if we can die gracefully here. */
00920     catch(Except &e) {
00921         Verbose::out(0,"");
00922         Err::errAbort(e.what());
00923     }
00924     catch(const std::bad_alloc &e) {
00925         Verbose::out(0,"");
00926         Err::errAbort("Ran out of memory. "
00927                       "Try using quitting other applications.");
00928     }
00929     catch(CalvinException &ce) {
00930         Verbose::out(0,"");
00931         Err::errAbort("Affymetrix GeneChip Command Console library has thrown an exception. "
00932                       "Calvin Error: '" +StringUtils::ConvertWCSToMBS(ce.Description()) + "'");
00933     }
00934     catch(const std::exception &e) {
00935         Verbose::out(0,"");
00936         Err::errAbort("Exception caught. "
00937                       "Most problems with this program are memory related. "
00938                       "Message is: " + ToStr(e.what()));
00939     }
00940     catch(const BaseException &e) {
00941         Verbose::out(0,"");
00942         Err::errAbort("newmat issue: " + ToStr(e.what()));
00943     }
00944     catch(...) {
00945         Verbose::out(0,"");
00946         Err::errAbort("Unknown exception caught "
00947                       "(most problems with this program are memory related).");
00948     }
00949     // cleanup -- KEEP IN SYNC WITH MEMORY FREEZ ABOVE IN CATCH
00950     for (uint32_t setIx = 0; setIx < metaSets.size(); setIx++) {
00951         delete metaSets[setIx];
00952     }
00953     metaSets.clear();
00954     for (uint32_t psIx = 0; psIx < probesetNames.size(); psIx++) {
00955         FreezArray(probesetNames[psIx]);
00956     }
00957     for (uint32_t psIx = 0; psIx < probesetDisplayNames.size(); psIx++) {
00958         FreezArray(probesetDisplayNames[psIx]);
00959     }
00960     for (uint32_t i = 0; i < analysisStreams.size(); i++) 
00961         delete analysisStreams[i];
00962     analysisStreams.clear();
00963     Freez(layout);
00964     Freez(iMart);
00965     removeTempDir(getOpt("temp-dir"));
00966 }
00967 
00968 /** 
00969  * @brief Write the headers for the various reports.
00970  * 
00971  * @param layout - Probe and probe set info.
00972  * @param iMart - Memory reprentation of data.
00973  * @param analysis - Collection of all the analysis that we are going to run.
00974  * @param startTime - Time of the beginning of processing.
00975  */
00976 void ProbesetSummarizeEngine::writeHeaders(IntensityMart &iMart,
00977                                            std::vector<AnalysisStreamExpression *> &analysis) {
00978   
00979     for (unsigned int analysisIx = 0; analysisIx < analysis.size(); analysisIx++) {
00980         string qMethodGuid = affxutil::Guid::GenerateNewGuid();
00981         AnalysisStreamExpression *as = analysis[analysisIx];
00982         assert(as);
00983         AnalysisInfo info = as->getInfo();
00984         as->addStdHeaders(getOpt("exec-guid"),
00985                           getOpt("time-start"),
00986                           getOpt("command-line"),
00987                           getOpt("version-to-report"),
00988                           info);
00989     }
00990 }
00991 
00992 ProbeSetGroup *ProbesetSummarizeEngine::makeProbesetGroupFromMeta(MetaProbeset &meta, ChipLayout &layout) {
00993     ProbeSetGroup *group = new ProbeSetGroup();
00994     group->ownMem = true;
00995     group->name = Util::cloneString(meta.name);
00996         group->displayName = meta.displayName;
00997     group->probeSets.resize(meta.probesets.size());
00998     int type = 0;
00999     int cnt = 0;
01000     for (int metaIx = 0; metaIx < meta.probesets.size(); metaIx++) {
01001         ProbeListPacked sub = layout.getProbeListByName(meta.probesets[metaIx]);
01002         if (sub.isNull()) {
01003             Verbose::out(2,"Skipping probeset " + ToStr(meta.probesets[metaIx]) + " in meta probeset " + ToStr(meta.name) + ". (Due to kill list?)");
01004         }
01005         else {
01006             if (cnt == 0) {
01007                 type = sub.get_type();
01008             }
01009             if (type != sub.get_type()) {
01010                 Err::errAbort("For meta probeset id: '" + ToStr(meta.name) + "'. Can't combine different types of probesets.");
01011             }
01012             ProbeSet *ps = ProbeListFactory::asProbeSet(sub);
01013             group->probeSets[cnt] = ps;
01014             cnt++;
01015         }
01016     }
01017     if (cnt > 0) {
01018         group->probeSets.resize(cnt);
01019         return group;
01020     } 
01021     else {
01022         Verbose::out(2,"Skipping meta probeset probeset " + ToStr(meta.name) + ". (Due to kill list?)");
01023         delete group;
01024         return NULL;
01025     }
01026 }
01027 
01028 /** 
01029  * @brief Loop through the groups and do the requested analysis for
01030  * each one.
01031  * 
01032  * @param layout - Probe and probe set info.
01033  * @param iMart - Memory reprentation of data.
01034  * @param psGroups - Groups of probe sets to be analyzed.
01035  * @param analysis - Analysis pathways to be computed.
01036  */
01037 void ProbesetSummarizeEngine::doSummaries(ChipLayout &layout,
01038                                           IntensityMart &iMart,
01039                                           const vector<ProbeListPacked>& plVec,
01040                                           vector<MetaProbeset *> &metaToRun,
01041                                           vector<AnalysisStreamExpression *> &analysis,
01042                                           int numPsSets) {
01043     vector<QuantMethodReport *> qReports;
01044     if (metaToRun.size() == 0) {
01045         unsigned int dotMod = max((int)plVec.size()/20, 1);
01046         Verbose::progressBegin(1, ToStr("Processing Probesets"), 20, (int)dotMod, (int)plVec.size());
01047         /* Heavy lifting. */
01048         for (unsigned int groupIx = 0; groupIx < plVec.size(); groupIx++) {
01049             /* Little UI */
01050             Verbose::progressStep(1);
01051             /* Run each summary. */
01052             ProbeSet* ps = ProbeListFactory::asProbeSet(plVec[groupIx]);
01053             ProbeSetGroup psGroup(ps); 
01054             for (unsigned int analysisIx = 0; analysisIx < analysis.size(); analysisIx++) {
01055                 analysis[analysisIx]->doAnalysis(psGroup, iMart, true);
01056             }
01057             // psGroup should delete the memory for ps...
01058         }
01059         Verbose::progressEnd(1, ToStr("Done."));
01060     }
01061     else {
01062         unsigned int dotMod = max((int)metaToRun.size()/20, 1);
01063         Verbose::progressBegin(1, ToStr("Processing Probesets"), 20, (int)dotMod, (int)metaToRun.size());
01064         /* Heavy lifting. */
01065         for (unsigned int groupIx = 0; groupIx < metaToRun.size(); groupIx++) {
01066             /* Little UI */
01067             Verbose::progressStep(1);
01068             ProbeSetGroup *psGroup = makeProbesetGroupFromMeta(*(metaToRun[groupIx]), layout);
01069             if (psGroup != NULL) {
01070                 /* Run each summary. */
01071                 for (unsigned int analysisIx = 0; analysisIx < analysis.size(); analysisIx++) {
01072                     analysis[analysisIx]->doAnalysis(*psGroup, iMart, true);
01073                 }
01074                 delete psGroup;
01075             }
01076         }
01077         Verbose::progressEnd(1, ToStr("Done."));
01078     }
01079 }
01080 
01081 
01082 /** 
01083  * Set all of the probes in the psGroups file to be loaded.
01084  * 
01085  * @param psGroups - Vector of probests containing probes to be set as true.
01086  * @param probeSubset - Bit vector in which probe ids should be set to true.
01087  */
01088 void ProbesetSummarizeEngine::mergeProbeSubset(const std::vector<ProbeListPacked> &plVec, std::vector<bool> &probeSubset) {
01089     for (unsigned int plIx = 0; plIx < plVec.size(); plIx++) {
01090         for (int pIx = 0; pIx < plVec[plIx].probe_cnt(); pIx++) {
01091             int id = plVec[plIx].get_probeId(pIx);
01092             if (id != ProbeList::null_probe) {
01093                 probeSubset[id] = true;
01094             }
01095         }
01096     }
01097 }
01098 
01099 /** 
01100  * Construct an object for output that contains the program an
01101  * algorithm information.
01102  * @param as - AnalysisStream to get information from.
01103  * @param layout - Layout to get information from.
01104  * @param metaSets - List of probeset names to output
01105  *
01106  * @return - Information for making CHP file.
01107  */
01108 AnalysisInfo ProbesetSummarizeEngine::makeAnalysisInfo(AnalysisStream *as,
01109                                                        ChipLayout &layout, 
01110                                                        vector<MetaProbeset *> &metaSets) {
01111 
01112     AnalysisInfo info;
01113     info.m_NumExpression = layout.getNumExpressionPSets();
01114     info.m_NumGenotyping = layout.getNumGenotypeingPSets();
01115     info.m_NumRows = layout.getXCount();
01116     info.m_NumCols = layout.getYCount();
01117     info.m_NumProbeSets = metaSets.size();
01118     info.m_ProbeSetType = affxcdf::ExpressionProbeSetType;
01119     fillInAnalysisInfo(info, as);
01120 
01121     // If CHP Output, then we need list of probeset names to output
01122     // Otherwise do not waste the memory
01123     if (getOptBool("cc-md-chp-output") || getOptBool("cc-chp-output") || getOptBool("xda-chp-output")) {
01124         vector<const char *> probesetNames;
01125         vector<const char *> probesetDisplayNames;
01126         probesetNames.reserve(metaSets.size());
01127         vector<MetaProbeset *>::iterator mIx;
01128         for (mIx = metaSets.begin(); mIx != metaSets.end(); ++mIx) {
01129             probesetNames.push_back((*mIx)->name);
01130             probesetDisplayNames.push_back((*mIx)->displayName);
01131         }
01132         info.m_ProbesetNames = probesetNames;
01133         info.m_ProbesetDisplayNames = probesetDisplayNames;
01134     }
01135 
01136     // Sanity check
01137     Err::check(info.m_ParamValues.size() == info.m_ParamNames.size(), 
01138    
01139                "AnalysisInfo - Names and values out of sync.");
01140     return info;
01141 }
01142 
01143 void ProbesetSummarizeEngine::addReporters_Expression(affx::TsvReport::TsvReportFmt_t report_format,
01144                             AnalysisInfo& info,
01145                             AnalysisStream *as, int precision) {
01146 
01147     QuantMethodExprReport *report = new QuantMethodExprReport(info.getNumCols());
01148     report->m_qMethod=as->getQuantMethod();
01149     report->setIsHeaderBuffer(1);
01150     report->setDirPath(getOpt("out-dir"));
01151     report->setPrecision(precision);
01152     report->m_summary_tsv_precision=precision;
01153     report->m_feffects_tsv_precision=precision-1;
01154     report->m_residuals_tsv_precision=precision;
01155     report->setFileprefix(as->getName());
01156     report->setFilename("QuantMethodExprReport-DEBUG"); // filename not used -- for debugging
01157     report->setWriteOldStyleFeatureEffectsFile(false);
01158 
01159     if (report_format == affx::TsvReport::FMT_TSV) {
01160         report->m_DoSummary=getOptBool("summaries");
01161         report->m_DoResiduals=getOptBool("feat-details");
01162         report->m_DoFeatureEffects=getOptBool("feat-effects");
01163     } 
01164     else {
01165         report->m_DoSummary=getOptBool("a5-summaries");
01166         report->m_DoResiduals=getOptBool("a5-feature-details");
01167         report->m_DoFeatureEffects=getOptBool("a5-feature-effects");
01168 
01169         if (getOptBool("a5-summaries-use-global")) {
01170             if (m_a5_global_output_group == NULL)
01171                 Err::errAbort("--a5-summaries-use-global option given, but no global file. Must specify --a5-global-file.");
01172             report->m_summary_a5_group = m_a5_global_output_group;
01173             Verbose::out(1,"Using global A5 file for allele summary output.");
01174         }
01175     
01176         if (getOptBool("a5-feature-details-use-global")) {
01177             if (m_a5_global_output_group == NULL)
01178                 Err::errAbort("--a5-feature-details-use-global option given, but no global file. Must specify --a5-global-file.");
01179             report->m_residuals_a5_group = m_a5_global_output_group;
01180             Verbose::out(1,"Using global A5 file for residuals output.");
01181         }
01182     
01183         if (getOptBool("a5-feature-effects-use-global")) {
01184             if (m_a5_global_output_group == NULL)
01185                 Err::errAbort("--a5-feature-effects-use-global option given, but no global file. Must specify --a5-global-file.");
01186             report->m_feffects_a5_group = m_a5_global_output_group;
01187             Verbose::out(1,"Using global A5 file for feature effects output.");
01188         }
01189     }
01190 
01191     report->setFormat(report_format);
01192 
01193     report->addStdHeaders(report,
01194                           getOpt("exec-guid"),
01195                           as->getGuid(),
01196                           getOpt("time-start"),
01197                           getOpt("command-line"),
01198                           getOpt("version-to-report"),
01199                           info);
01200     as->addReporter(report);
01201 }
01202 
01203 /** 
01204  * Add the requested reporters for a given AnalysisStream.
01205  * 
01206  * @param as - AnalysisStream that needs the reporters.
01207  * @param eMethod - Expression quantification method that is being used to summarize probesets in this AnalysisStream.
01208  * @param metaSets - list of probesets to output.
01209  * @param stats -
01210  */
01211 void ProbesetSummarizeEngine::setupReporters(AnalysisStreamExpression *as, 
01212                                              QuantExprMethod *eMethod, 
01213                                              vector<MetaProbeset *> &metaSets,
01214                                              CelStatListener *stats) {
01215 
01216     int precision = getOptInt("precision");
01217     if (precision > 16) {
01218         precision = 16;
01219         Verbose::out(2, "Changing precision for reports from "+ ToStr(precision) +" to 16");
01220     }
01221     string outDir = getOpt("out-dir");
01222     vector<string> celFiles = getOptVector("cels");
01223 
01224     AnalysisInfo info = as->getInfo();
01225   
01226     /* Add our primary text reporter. */
01227     if (precision < 0) {
01228         precision = 0;
01229         if (as->getQuantMethod()->getType() == "dabg") {
01230             precision = 5;
01231         }
01232     }
01233     // Add txt expression reporter
01234     if (getOptBool("summaries") || getOptBool("feat-effects") || getOptBool("feat-details")) {
01235         addReporters_Expression(affx::TsvReport::FMT_TSV,info,as,precision);
01236     }
01237     if (getOptBool("a5-summaries") || getOptBool("a5-feature-effects") || getOptBool("a5-feature-details")) {
01238         addReporters_Expression(affx::TsvReport::FMT_A5,info,as,precision);
01239     }
01240 
01241     bool isDetection = static_cast<QuantExprMethod *>(as->getQuantMethod())->getQuantType() == QuantExprMethod::Detection;
01242 
01243     QuantMethodExprChipSummary *runSummary = new QuantMethodExprChipSummary(celFiles, isDetection, 0, 0.01, getOpt("qc-probesets"), metaSets);
01244     runSummary->setFilename("runSummary");
01245   
01246     QuantMethodRunReport *runReport = new QuantMethodRunReport(celFiles);
01247     if (getOpt("report-file") != "") {
01248         string dir = Fs::dirname(getOpt("report-file"));
01249         if (dir == "")
01250             dir = outDir;
01251         string name = Fs::basename(getOpt("report-file"));
01252         runReport->setDirPath(dir);
01253         runSummary->setDirPath(dir);
01254         runReport->setFilename(name);
01255     } 
01256     else {
01257         runSummary->setDirPath(outDir);
01258         runReport->setDirPath(outDir);
01259         runReport->setFilename(as->getName()+".report");
01260     }
01261     runReport->setFormat(affx::TsvReport::FMT_TSV);
01262     runReport->setPrecision(6);
01263 
01264     runReport->registerChipSummary(dynamic_cast<ChipSummary *>(stats));
01265     runReport->registerChipSummary(dynamic_cast<ChipSummary *>(runSummary));
01266 
01267     set<string> group;
01268     set<uint32_t> groupId;
01269     as->addReporter(runSummary);
01270     as->addReporter(runReport);
01271 
01272     // Setup Multi Data CHP Output
01273     if (getOptBool("cc-md-chp-output")){
01274         string ccchpDir;
01275         /* If chp directory not specified use  output/cc-chp/ by default. */
01276         if (getOpt("cc-md-chp-out-dir") == "") { ccchpDir = Fs::join(outDir,"cc-md-chp"); }
01277         else { ccchpDir = getOpt("cc-md-chp-out-dir"); }
01278         Util::chompLastIfSep(ccchpDir);
01279         QuantMethodMultiDataCCCHPReport *ccchpReporter = new QuantMethodMultiDataCCCHPReport(ccchpDir);
01280         vector<string> resultFiles = getOptVector("result-files");
01281         if (resultFiles.size() > 0)
01282             ccchpReporter->setChpFileNames(resultFiles);
01283         ccchpReporter->SetGenoTypeOnly(false);
01284         ccchpReporter->registerChipSummary(dynamic_cast<ChipSummary *>(stats));
01285         ccchpReporter->registerChipSummary(dynamic_cast<ChipSummary *>(runSummary));
01286         as->addReporter(ccchpReporter);
01287     }
01288 
01289     // Setup Old Expression CHP Output
01290     if (getOptBool("cc-chp-output")) {
01291         string ccchpDir;
01292         /* If chp directory not specified use  output/cc-chp/ by default. */
01293         if (getOpt("cc-chp-out-dir") == "") { ccchpDir = Fs::join(outDir,"cc-chp"); }
01294         else { ccchpDir = getOpt("cc-chp-out-dir"); }
01295         Util::chompLastIfSep(ccchpDir);
01296         QuantMethodExprCCCHPReport *ccchpReporter = new QuantMethodExprCCCHPReport(info, ccchpDir, eMethod->getType());
01297         vector<string> resultFiles = getOptVector("result-files");
01298         if (resultFiles.size() > 0)
01299             ccchpReporter->setChpFileNames(resultFiles);
01300         ccchpReporter->registerChipSummary(dynamic_cast<ChipSummary *>(stats));
01301         ccchpReporter->registerChipSummary(dynamic_cast<ChipSummary *>(runSummary));
01302         as->addReporter(ccchpReporter);
01303     }
01304 
01305     // setup XDA CHP output if neccesary.
01306     if (getOptBool("xda-chp-output")) {
01307         string chpDir;
01308         /* If chp directory not specified use  output/chp/ by default. */
01309         if (getOpt("xda-chp-out-dir") == "") { chpDir =  Fs::join(outDir,"chp"); } 
01310         else { chpDir = getOpt("xda-chp-out-dir"); }
01311         Util::chompLastIfSep(chpDir);
01312         QuantMethodExprCHPReport *chpReporter = new QuantMethodExprCHPReport(info, chpDir, eMethod->getType());
01313         vector<string> resultFiles = getOptVector("result-files");
01314         if (resultFiles.size() > 0)
01315             chpReporter->setChpFileNames(resultFiles);
01316         as->addReporter(chpReporter);
01317     }
01318   
01319     if (getOptBool("subsample-report")) {
01320         QuantMethodSamplerReport *sReport = NULL;
01321         /* Add our sampling reporter, just reports on 1 out of every 10 probesets. */
01322         string prefix = Fs::join(outDir,as->getName());
01323         sReport = new QuantMethodSamplerReport(9, prefix, 5, true, true, true);
01324         as->addReporter(sReport);
01325     }
01326 
01327 }
01328 
01329 /** 
01330  * Read the design of the chip from the cdf file. Also can read the
01331  * design from an spf file is that is supplied.
01332  * 
01333  * @param layout - Object to be filled in.
01334  * @param psGroups - Probe sets to be filled in.
01335  * @param probesToLoad - Additional probes to be loaded (i.e. background probes.)
01336  * @param probeSubset - Bitmap to remember the probes that were actually loaded.
01337  */
01338 void ProbesetSummarizeEngine::loadCdfLayout(ChipLayout &layout, 
01339                                             vector<MetaProbeset *> &metaToLoad,
01340                                             const vector<Probe *> &probesToLoad, 
01341                                             std::vector<const char *> *probesetNames,
01342                                             vector<bool> &probeSubset, 
01343                                             bool justStats, 
01344                                             bool doAll,
01345                                             probeidmap_t &killList)
01346 {
01347     set<const char *, Util::ltstr> psNameLoadMap;
01348     string cdfFile = getOpt("cdf-file");
01349     string spfFile = getOpt("spf-file");
01350 
01351     // Are we doing a subset of all the probe sets? 
01352     if (!metaToLoad.empty() && !doAll) {
01353         for (unsigned int i = 0; i < metaToLoad.size(); i++) {
01354             for (unsigned int psIx = 0; psIx < metaToLoad[i]->probesets.size(); psIx++) { 
01355                 psNameLoadMap.insert(metaToLoad[i]->probesets[psIx]);
01356             }
01357         }
01358     }
01359     // Load up the data from the file.
01360     string fileName = cdfFile!="" ? cdfFile : spfFile;
01361     try {
01362         if (cdfFile!="") {
01363             Verbose::out(1, ToStr("Opening cdf file: ") + Fs::basename(cdfFile));
01364             if (!layout.openCdf(cdfFile, 
01365                                 psNameLoadMap, 
01366                                 probesetNames,
01367                                 probeSubset, 
01368                                 "", 
01369                                 killList, 
01370                                 justStats)) 
01371                 Err::errAbort("Couldn't open cdf file: " + cdfFile);
01372         }
01373         else if (spfFile!="") {
01374             std::set<affxcdf::GeneChipProbeSetType> psTypesToLoad;
01375             if (getOpt("kill-list") != "")
01376                 Err::errAbort("Cannot specify probe kill list with spf file");
01377             Verbose::out(1, ToStr("Opening layout file: ") + Fs::basename(spfFile));
01378             layout.openSpf(spfFile, 
01379                            psNameLoadMap, 
01380                            probesetNames, 
01381                            probeSubset,
01382                            "", 
01383                            justStats, 
01384                            psTypesToLoad);
01385         }
01386         else {
01387             Err::errAbort("Must have either a cdf file or spf file in cdf mode.");
01388         }
01389     }
01390     catch(const Except &e) {
01391         Err::errAbort(e.what());
01392     }
01393     catch(...) {
01394         Err::errAbort("Uncaught exception opening file: '" + fileName + "'");
01395     }
01396 }
01397 
01398 /** 
01399  * Read the design of the chip from the pgf & clf files.
01400  * 
01401  * @param layout - Object to be filled in.
01402  * @param metaToLoad
01403  * @param probesToLoad - Additional probes to be loaded (i.e. background probes.)
01404  * @param probeSubset - Bitmap to remember the probes that were actually loaded.
01405  * @param killList  
01406  */
01407 void ProbesetSummarizeEngine::loadPgfLayout(ChipLayout &layout, 
01408                                             std::vector<MetaProbeset *> &metaToLoad,
01409                                             const std::vector<Probe *> &probesToLoad, 
01410                                             std::vector<const char *> *probesetNames,
01411                                             std::vector<const char *> *probesetDisplayNames,
01412                                             std::vector<bool> &probeSubset, 
01413                                             probeidmap_t &killList,
01414                                             bool justStats, bool doAll) {
01415     affx::ClfFile clf;
01416     vector<string> requiredCols;
01417     unsigned int i = 0;
01418     unsigned int numProbes = 0;
01419     std::set<const char *, Util::ltstr> psIdLoadMap;
01420     vector<unsigned int> psIdNotInGroup;
01421     std::string pgfFile = getOpt("pgf-file"); 
01422     std::string clfFile = getOpt("clf-file");
01423         string qccFile = getOpt("qc-probesets");
01424 
01425 
01426         try 
01427         {
01428                 std::string analysis = getOpt("analysis");
01429 
01430                 if (strstr (analysis.c_str (),"gc-correction") ||
01431                         strstr (analysis.c_str (),"gc-sst-rma-sketch") ||
01432                         strstr (analysis.c_str (),"scale-intensities"))
01433                 {
01434                         if (qccFile != "")
01435                         {
01436                                 QCProbesetOptions qcc_opts;
01437                                 QCProbesetOptions::readQCCFile(qccFile, qcc_opts);
01438                                 layout.setQCProbeSets (qcc_opts.headerProbesets);
01439                         }
01440                 }
01441         }
01442     catch(Except &e)
01443         {
01444     }
01445 
01446     /* open clf file. */
01447     if (clfFile=="")
01448         Err::errAbort("Must specify a clf-file for chip.");
01449     Verbose::out(1, ToStr("Opening clf file: ") +  Fs::basename(clfFile));
01450     if (!clf.open(clfFile))
01451         Err::errAbort(ToStr("Couldn't open clf file: ") + clfFile);
01452     layout.setDimensions(clf.getXMax() + 1, clf.getYMax() + 1);
01453 
01454     /* Make sure our assumptions about CLF file are true */
01455     Err::check(clf.getSequential() == 1,
01456                "ProbesetSummarizeEngine::loadPgfLayout() - unable to handle clf file without sequential set to 1.");
01457     Err::check(clf.getOrder().compare("col_major") == 0 || clf.getOrder().compare("row_major") == 0,
01458                "Unable to handle clf file without order set to row_major (old mislabeled 'col_major' accepted due to earlier bug.)");
01459 
01460     /* What probes are we loading? */
01461     numProbes = (clf.getXMax() + 1) * (clf.getYMax() + 1);
01462     probeSubset.resize(numProbes);
01463     for (i = 0; i < probeSubset.size(); i++) 
01464         probeSubset[i] = false;
01465 
01466     // Are we doing a subset of all the probe sets? 
01467     if (!metaToLoad.empty() && !doAll) {
01468         for (i = 0; i < metaToLoad.size(); i++) {
01469             for (unsigned int psIx = 0; psIx < metaToLoad[i]->probesets.size(); psIx++) { 
01470                 psIdLoadMap.insert(metaToLoad[i]->probesets[psIx]);
01471             }
01472         }
01473     }
01474   
01475     /* Open actual pgf file. */
01476     if (Util::sameString(pgfFile,"")) 
01477         Err::errAbort("Must specify PGF for chip.");
01478     Verbose::out(1, ToStr("Opening pgf file: ") + Fs::basename(pgfFile));
01479     time_t startTime = time(NULL);
01480     if (!layout.openPgf(pgfFile, clf.getXMax() + 1, clf.getYMax() + 1, psIdLoadMap, probesetNames, probesetDisplayNames,
01481                         probeSubset, "", killList, justStats, false)) {
01482         Err::errAbort("Couldn't open PGF file: " + ToStr(pgfFile));
01483     }
01484     time_t endTime = time(NULL);
01485     int t = endTime - startTime;
01486     Verbose::out(2, ToStr("Pgf load took approximately: ") + ToStr(t) + ToStr(" seconds."));
01487 }
01488 
01489 
01490 /** 
01491  * Load up the probe set definitions.
01492  * 
01493  * @param layout - Object to be filled in.
01494  * @param psGroups - Probe sets to be filled in.
01495  * @param metaToLoad
01496  * @param killList  
01497  * @param probesToLoad - Additional probes to be loaded (i.e. background probes.)
01498  * @param probeSubset - Bitmap to remember the probes that were actually loaded.
01499  * @param probetIds 
01500  * @param probesetNames
01501  */
01502 void ProbesetSummarizeEngine::loadChipLayout(ChipLayout &layout, 
01503                                              vector<MetaProbeset *> &metaToLoad,  
01504                                              probeidmap_t &killList,
01505                                              std::vector<const char *> *probesetNames,
01506                                              std::vector<const char *> *probesetDisplayNames,
01507                                              const vector<Probe *> &probesToLoad, 
01508                                              vector<bool> &probeSubset, 
01509                                              bool justStats, 
01510                                              bool doAll)
01511 {
01512     if (getOpt("cdf-file")!="" || getOpt("spf-file")!="") 
01513         loadCdfLayout(layout,
01514                       metaToLoad, 
01515                       probesToLoad, 
01516                       probesetNames, 
01517                       probeSubset, 
01518                       justStats, 
01519                       doAll, 
01520                       killList);
01521     else if (getOpt("pgf-file")!="")
01522         loadPgfLayout(layout, 
01523                       metaToLoad, 
01524                       probesToLoad, 
01525                       probesetNames,
01526                       probesetDisplayNames,
01527                       probeSubset, 
01528                       killList, 
01529                       justStats, 
01530                       doAll);
01531     else
01532         Err::errAbort("Must be in either pgf or cdf mode.");
01533     if (metaToLoad.empty()) {
01534         metaToLoad.reserve(probesetNames->size());
01535         for (unsigned int psIx = 0; psIx < probesetNames->size(); psIx++) {
01536             MetaProbeset *set = new MetaProbeset();
01537             set->freeSubs = false;
01538             set->name = (*probesetNames)[psIx];
01539             set->displayName = (probesetDisplayNames != NULL ? (*probesetDisplayNames)[psIx] : NULL);
01540             set->probesets.resize(1);
01541             set->probesets[0] = set->name;
01542             metaToLoad.push_back(set);
01543         }
01544     }
01545   else if (probesetDisplayNames != NULL)
01546   {
01547           map<string, MetaProbeset*> mpsmap;
01548           for(unsigned int mIx = 0; mIx < metaToLoad.size(); mIx++) {
01549                   mpsmap[metaToLoad[mIx]->name] = metaToLoad[mIx];
01550           }
01551           for(unsigned int psIx = 0; psIx < probesetNames->size(); psIx++) {
01552                   const char *name = (*probesetNames)[psIx];
01553                   if (mpsmap.find(name) != mpsmap.end()) {
01554                           mpsmap[name]->displayName = (*probesetDisplayNames)[psIx];
01555                   }
01556           }
01557   }
01558 //  unsigned int psCount = layout.getProbeSetCount();
01559 //  plVec.resize(psCount);
01560 //  for (unsigned int psIx = 0; psIx < psCount; psIx++) {
01561 //    plVec[psIx] = layout.getProbeListAtIndex(psIx);
01562 //  }
01563 }
01564 
01565 void
01566 ProbesetSummarizeEngine::determineDesiredOrder(ChipLayout& layout,
01567                                                vector<int> &desiredOrder, 
01568                                                AnalysisStreamFactory &asFactory,
01569                                                bool haveSubset,
01570                                                vector<MetaProbeset *> &metaSets) {
01571     const vector<Probe *> &gcProbes = asFactory.getGcControlProbes();
01572     // If no meta probesets then just use the layout in the cdf/spf/pgf
01573 
01574     if (!haveSubset) {
01575         const vector<int> &layoutOrder = layout.getProbeLayoutOrder();
01576         desiredOrder.reserve(gcProbes.size() + layoutOrder.size());
01577         for (int i = 0; i < layoutOrder.size(); i++) {
01578             desiredOrder.push_back(layoutOrder[i]);
01579         }
01580     }
01581     // If meta sets then we want to order in the same order as the
01582     // meta probesets.
01583     else {
01584         for (int i = 0; i < metaSets.size(); i++) {
01585             for (int j = 0; j < metaSets[i]->probesets.size(); j++) {
01586                 ProbeListPacked pl = layout.getProbeListByName(metaSets[i]->probesets[j]);
01587                 if (!pl.isNull()) {
01588                     for (int pIx = 0; pIx < pl.probe_cnt(); pIx++) {
01589                         desiredOrder.push_back(pl.get_probeId(pIx));
01590                     }
01591                 }
01592             }
01593         }
01594     }
01595     for (int i = 0; i < gcProbes.size(); i++) {
01596       desiredOrder.push_back(gcProbes[i]->id);
01597     }
01598 }
01599 
01600 void ProbesetSummarizeEngine::addProbeSet(ProbeSet *basicPs, ProbeSet *currentPs) {
01601     if (basicPs->atomsPerGroup.size() != 1) {
01602         Err::errAbort("addProbeset() - Error: Can't merge probesets with more than one block");
01603     }
01604     for (int i = 0; i < currentPs->atoms.size(); i++) {
01605         basicPs->atoms.push_back(currentPs->atoms[i]);
01606         ///@todo we should really make sure that PM-only and PM-MM probesets are merged correctly
01607             if (basicPs->hasMM() != currentPs->hasMM())
01608                 Err::errAbort("Cannot merge probesets which have MM with those that do not.");
01609             basicPs->atomsPerGroup[0] += (currentPs->hasMM() ? 
01610                                           currentPs->atoms[i]->probes.size() / 2 : currentPs->atoms[i]->probes.size());
01611     }
01612 
01613 }

01719 
01720 void ProbesetSummarizeEngine::printStandardMethods(std::ostream &out) {
01721     map<string,string>::iterator iter;
01722     out << endl << "Standard Methods:" << endl;
01723     unsigned int maxLength = 0;
01724     for (iter = m_stdMethods.begin(); iter != m_stdMethods.end(); iter++) {
01725         if (iter->first.size() > maxLength)
01726             maxLength = iter->first.size();
01727     }
01728     for (iter = m_stdMethods.begin(); iter != m_stdMethods.end(); iter++) {
01729         unsigned int currentLength = 0;
01730         out << " '" << iter->first << "' ";
01731         currentLength = iter->first.size();
01732         while (currentLength < maxLength + 1) {
01733             out.put(' ');
01734             currentLength++;
01735         }
01736         out << iter->second << endl;
01737     }
01738 }
01739 
01740 void ProbesetSummarizeEngine::closeGlobalA5() {
01741     // A5 close global groups
01742     if (m_a5_global_output_group!=NULL) {
01743         m_a5_global_output_group->close();
01744         delete m_a5_global_output_group;
01745         m_a5_global_output_group=NULL;
01746     }
01747     if (m_a5_global_input_group!=NULL) {
01748         m_a5_global_input_group->close();
01749         delete m_a5_global_input_group;
01750         m_a5_global_input_group=NULL;
01751     }
01752 
01753     // A5 close global files
01754     if (m_a5_global_output_file != m_a5_global_input_file) {
01755         affx::TsvReport::closeA5File(m_a5_global_output_file);
01756         affx::TsvReport::closeA5File(m_a5_global_input_file);
01757     } 
01758     else {
01759         affx::TsvReport::closeA5File(m_a5_global_output_file);
01760         m_a5_global_input_file = NULL;
01761     }
01762 }

01764 void ProbesetSummarizeEngine::extraHelp() {
01765     ChipStreamFactory cFactory;
01766     PmAdjusterFactory aFactory;
01767     QuantMethodFactory qFactory(QuantMethodFactory::Expression);
01768     AnalysisStreamFactory asFactory;
01769 
01770     printStandardMethods(cout);
01771     EngineUtil::printSelfDocs("Data transformations:", cFactory.getDocs());
01772     EngineUtil::printSelfDocs("Pm Intensity Adjustments:", aFactory.getDocs());
01773     EngineUtil::printSelfDocs("Quantification Methods:", qFactory.getDocs());
01774     EngineUtil::printSelfDocs("Analysis Streams:", asFactory.getDocs());
01775 }
